                # 开通腾讯cos

                • 公有读私有写
                • 其他都是默认的

                
avatar imageMogr2/thumbnail/100x/interlace/0|imageMogr2/gravity/center/crop/100x100 
normal imageMogr2/thumbnail/800x/interlace/1 
thumbnail imageMogr2/thumbnail/300x/interlace/0

                # 后端配置

                注意imgUrl地址为: region 加一个/
